summary: Redguard archer and sneak focused follower available in UNP, CBBE, and SeveNBase; with and without armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#9900ff][size=6]Shaley[/size][/color]


[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/i8tutf11j/20161020022033_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Shaley
Race:  Custom Redguard Race
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.02
Weight:  85
Body:  Base UNP, CBBE, & SeveNBase options
Skin:  Fair Skin - Optimized
Armor:  Midnight Breed (w/ altered armor rating)
Weapons:  CL Ebony Bow, Arrows, and Dagger
Location:  Drunken Huntsman - Whiterun

Class:  Combat Ranger
Style:  Missile

Levels with player.  Redguard traits/bonuses.
Skill Bonuses:  Archery & Sneak
Perks:  Complete Archery & Sneak trees

Tested with AFT & EFF
ENB:  RealVision & Vividian

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/htn6e54hz/20161020161301_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
Skyrim & Update

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
BBP/TBBP Compatible Skeleton such as XPMSE
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
Armor may clip in certain positions/poses.

Some ENBs may show a slight texture difference between head and body.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/cuuirf5dz/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/70kof7h1j/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  What is the other armor shown in some screenshots?
A:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53494/?]Wild Huntress[/url] (available here on the Nexus)

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
